description:
18.2 abitscope
Convert input audio to a video output, displaying the audio bit scope.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: abitscope

options.description: Set frame rate, expressed as number of frames per second. Default value is "25".
options.name: rate

options.description: Specify the video size for the output. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual. Default value is 1024x256.
options.name: size

options.description: Specify list of colors separated by space or by ’|’ which will be used to draw channels. Unrecognized or missing colors will be replaced by white color.
options.name: colors

options.description: Set output mode. Can be bars or trace. Default is bars.
options.name: mode
